SELECT
    t.`id`,
    t.`name`,
    t.`phone`,
    t.`age`,
    t.`create_time`  
FROM
    `t_sys_user` t 
LEFT JOIN
    (
        SELECT
            t1.`uid` AS `uid`,
            COUNT((CASE WHEN t3.`name` = 'å·¥å•†éŠ€è¡Œ' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END)) AS `__count2__`,
            (CASE WHEN COUNT((CASE WHEN t3.`name` = 'å»ºè¨­éŠ€è¡Œ' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END)) > 0 THEN false ELSE true END) AS `__none3__` 
        FROM
            `t_bank_card` t1 
        INNER JOIN
            `t_bank` t3 
                ON t3.`id` = t1.`bank_id` 
        GROUP BY
            t1.`uid`
    ) t2 
        ON t2.`uid` = t.`id` 
WHERE
    IFNULL(t2.`__count2__`,0) >= 2 
    AND IFNULL(t2.`__none3__`,true) = true
